description: This dataset shows the 2013 School Progress Report Card data elements for each CPS high school. The report card is an annual summary of how the school is doing. For more information on the School Progress Report Cards, please see http://www.cps.edu/SCHOOLDATA/Pages/SchoolProgressReports.aspx

name: Chicago Public Schools - High School Progress Report (2013-2014)
